Posts.EditableText:
Hello, I'm pretty new here and I've been dedicating some free time to imagine a story for a gamebook in Quest and now when I've started, I'm wondering if it's possible to port the gamebook on Android. If it is possible, am I supposed to do something before starting a gamebook, while writing (like doing coding at the same time), or can I just do something after I've done my gamebook?

Sorry if this kind of topic has already been made but I'm really new to all this. Thanks.
Posts.HTML:
Hello, I'm pretty new here and I've been dedicating some free time to imagine a story for a gamebook in Quest and now when I've started, I'm wondering if it's possible to port the gamebook on Android. Sorry if this kind of topic has already been made but I'm really new to all this. Thanks.
